meanings.sent1: The elfish hat had a pointy tip.
meanings.sent2: Her elfish features reminded me of a fairy tale character.
meanings.sent3: The elfish shoes made him feel like a magical creature.
meanings.sent4: The forest had an elfish charm, as if elves lived there.
meanings.sent5: The elfish music filled the air with enchantment.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of an elf.
meanings.sent1: The child's elfish grin was contagious.
meanings.sent2: The old tree had an elfish appearance with its twisted branches.
meanings.sent3: Her elfish dance brought smiles to everyone around.
meanings.sent4: The garden had an elfish quality, like something out of a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The elfish laughter echoed through the forest.

meanings.sent1: The elfish kitten batted at the yarn playfully.
meanings.sent2: His elfish sense of humor always kept us entertained.
meanings.sent3: The elfish prank made everyone laugh, even the victim.
meanings.sent4: Her elfish grin hinted at a mischievous plan.
meanings.sent5: The elfish twinkle in his eye revealed his playful nature.
